name: yas - yet another shooter
description:
Kill all your enemies in this frenetic action game for Playdate.

Features:
- hard as fuck (maybe the game is easy, and I suck, I'm not sure)
- juices that can give you an epilepsy attack 
- 5 levels
- 5 enemies
- 6 weapons
- better than nothing art
- better than nothing music and SFX
- mind blowing plot

Gameplay:
- every new game you will start with a random weapon
- after the end of the levels you will see 2 boxes, one with health and another with a random weapon
- if your life is lower than 30%, you'll shoot after using dash

Controls:
D-PAD: Movement / Aim
A: Hold to shoot  
B: Dash 
While on cinematics: A: advance, B: back.

Source code: https://github.com/ussaohelcim/yas
